articles.title: Vivo Y55 with MediaTek 700 chip, 5000mAh battery launched - India Today
articles.description: Vivo has announced a new mid-range smartphone, called the Vivo Y55 5G. It has a standard 60Hz display and has a triple-camera setup on the back.
